articles.author: Jeff Mason, Ismail Shakil
articles.description: U.S. President Donald Trumpramped up his tariff assault on Canada on Thursday, saying the U.S. would impose a 35% tariff on imports next month and planned to impose blanket tariffs of 15% or 20% on most other trading partners.
articles.title: Trump puts 35% tariff on Canada, eyes 15%-20% tariffs for others
